Translations.Text: Ona see angels floating around throne glorifying chvalit ich Lord After equitable judgment issued do all it proclaimed Chvalit bol GOD Lord universe
This revelation scripture bol GOD Almighty Omniscient
Forgiver zhresit acceptor repentance strict v enforcing retribution possessor all power There nie bol inak god Him. Do Him bol ultimate destiny
Ziaden argues GOD's revelations except those disbelieve! Nie imponovat ich zjavny zdar

Disbelieving them bol ludia Noah vela inaksie opponents them! Kazdy obec persecuted ich posol neutralize him. they argued falsehood defeat truth. Consequently ja punished them; ako hrozny bol Moj retribution
Thus judgment tvoj Lord already znamka upon those disbelieve lenze they bol dwellers Hell

Those serve throne all those around it glorify chvalit ich Lord verit v Him! they ziadat forgiveness those verit Our Lord Tvoj zlutovanie Tvoj znalost encompass all things. Forgive those repent nasledovat Tvoj chodnicek rezervny them retribution Hell
